name: gemini-coder
description: CWC is a free AI coding assistant without agents

codeWebChat.geminiUserId.description: Run Gemini chatbot as non-default user. Check URL for ID, e.g. gemini.google.com/u/2/app -> 2.

codeWebChat.commitMessageInstructions.description: Style and conventions (e.g. Conventional Commits, gitmoji) for generated commit messages.
codeWebChat.commitMessageInstructions.default: Write a brief and precise summary for the changes, limited to a single sentence if possible and nothing else. Use an imperative tone to ensure clarity and focus on the primary change or purpose.

codeWebChat.commitMessageAutoAcceptAfter.description: Automatically accept the generated commit message after a specified number of seconds.

codeWebChat.contextSizeWarningThreshold.description: Threshold for the context size to show a warning.

codeWebChat.checkpointLifespan.description: The lifespan of checkpoints in hours. Checkpoints older than this will be automatically deleted.

codeWebChat.clearChecksInWorkspaceBehavi.description: Controls the behavior of the 'Clear Checks' action in the Workspace view.

codeWebChat.ignorePatterns.description: List of glob patterns to ignore files and folders in the context.

codeWebChat.editFormatInstructions.description: Style of generated code blocks in "Edit context" mode.

default.whole: Whenever showing a new or updated file, include the path in a first-line comment of a Markdown Code Block. Print files in full because I have a disability which means I can't type and need to be able to just copy and paste.
default.truncated: Whenever showing a new or updated file, include the path in a first-line comment of a Markdown Code Block. Unchanged parts should be truncated with ellipsis comments, e.g. "// ...".
default.diff: Show changes in the Unified Diff format (compatible with git apply).

codeWebChat.editContextSystemInstruction.description: System instructions for the Edit Context API tool.
codeWebChat.editContextSystemInstruction.default: You're a helpful coding assistant. Don't explain changes in inline comments.

codeWebChat.chatPresetsForAskAboutContex.description: Preset is a general or task specific web chat configuration.

examples: Outline the steps needed to achieve:
Describe the purpose of this code:
I need assistance troubleshooting this issue:
Generate commit message based on changes:
promptPrefix.description: Prefix prepended to all prompts sent with this chat.

examples: Summarize your understanding of the problem.
Ask for clarifications if needed before proceeding.
promptSuffix.description: Suffix appended to all prompts sent with this chat.

port.description: Open WebUI only. Port for 'localhost', if your instance is networked, remove this param and proxy it to `http://openwebui/` with nginx.

isSelected.description: Whether this preset is selected when initializing a new chat.

isPinned.description: Whether this preset is shown above the list.

examples: Outline the steps needed to achieve:

promptPrefix.description: Prefix prepended to all prompts sent with this chat.

examples: Summarize your understanding of the problem.

promptSuffix.description: Suffix appended to all prompts sent with this chat.

port.description: Open WebUI only. Port for 'localhost', if your instance is networked, remove this param and proxy it to `http://openwebui/` with nginx.

isSelected.description: Whether this preset is selected when initializing a new chat.

isPinned.description: Whether this preset is shown above the list.

port.description: Open WebUI only. Port for 'localhost', if your instance is networked, remove this param and proxy it to `http://openwebui/` with nginx.

codeWebChat.promptTemplatesForAskAboutCo.description: Prompt templates for 'Ask about context' mode.

codeWebChat.promptTemplatesForCodeAtCurs.description: Prompt templates for "Code at cursor" mode.

codeWebChat.modelProviders.description: Configuration for AI model providers. API keys are stored separately in secret storage.

name.description: A unique name for the custom provider.

baseUrl.description: The base URL of the API endpoint for the custom provider.

codeWebChat.configurationsForCodeComplet.description: Configurations for the Code Completions tool.

providerName.description: Name of the model provider to use (must be defined in modelProviders).

reasoningEffort.description: The reasoning effort for the model.

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default configuration for this tool.

isPinned.description: Whether this configuration is shown above the list.

codeWebChat.configurationsForEditContext.description: Configurations for the Edit Context tool.

providerName.description: Name of the model provider to use (must be defined in modelProviders).

reasoningEffort.description: The reasoning effort for the model.

instructionsPlacement.description: Placement of instructions relative to the code context.

isPinned.description: Whether this configuration is shown above the list.

codeWebChat.configurationsForIntelligent.description: Configurations for the Intelligent Update tool.

providerName.description: Name of the model provider to use (must be defined in modelProviders).

reasoningEffort.description: The reasoning effort for the model.

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default configuration for this tool.

isPinned.description: Whether this configuration is shown above the list.

codeWebChat.configurationsForCommitMessa.description: Configurations for the Commit Messages tool.
